meanings.definition: Lantanas: a type of flowering plant
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with colorful lantanas.
meanings.sent2: She admired the lantanas in full bloom.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the lantanas.
meanings.sent4: Her love for lantanas blossomed like the flowers themselves.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the lantanas lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: Lantanas: plural form of lantana, referring to multiple plants of the same species
meanings.sent1: The lantanas in the park attracted many butterflies.
meanings.sent2: We planted new lantanas in our backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrels played hide-and-seek among the lantanas.
meanings.sent4: The field of lantanas resembled a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent5: The lantanas swayed gently in the breeze.
